title: Electron Microscopy Sciences
content: For over 60 years, Electron Microscopy Sciences has been specializing in the manufacture, preparation, and distribution of the most innovative and highest quality chemicals, supplies, and equipment for microscopy, histology, and general laboratory research. Our steady and consistent growth has been based not only on offering quality products and prompt friendly service, but also on the trust that our valued customers place in us to provide the best value in the marketplace.
